pli-tv-pvr19:3.2: How many on up to the third time?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.3: How many here are the eight things?
pli-tv-pvr19:3.4: through how many is the whole collection?”
pli-tv-pvr19:4.2: two up to the third time,
pli-tv-pvr19:4.4: through one is the whole collection.”
pli-tv-pvr19:5.1: “How many are the sources of Discipline
pli-tv-pvr19:5.2: that have been laid down by the Buddha?
pli-tv-pvr19:5.3: How many are called serious in the Discipline?
pli-tv-pvr19:5.4: How many called concealing a very bad (offence)?”
pli-tv-pvr19:6.2: that have been laid down by the Buddha,
pli-tv-pvr19:6.3: Two are called serious in the Discipline,
pli-tv-pvr19:6.4: two concealings of a very bad (offence).”
pli-tv-pvr19:7.2: How many due to the other side of a river?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.3: In (eating) how many meats is there a grave offence?
pli-tv-pvr19:7.4: In how many meats an offence of wrong-doing?”
pli-tv-pvr19:8.2: four due to the other side of a river,
pli-tv-pvr19:8.3: In (eating) one meat there is a grave offence,
pli-tv-pvr19:8.4: in nine meats an offence of wrong-doing.”
pli-tv-pvr19:9.2: How many verbal offences by day?
pli-tv-pvr19:9.3: How many offences for one who is giving?
pli-tv-pvr19:9.4: How many for one who is receiving?”
pli-tv-pvr19:10.3: Three offences for one who is giving,
pli-tv-pvr19:11.2: How many for which amends are made?
pli-tv-pvr19:11.3: How many here for which amends are not made
pli-tv-pvr19:11.4: are spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:12.2: six for which amends are made,
pli-tv-pvr19:12.3: One here for which amends are not made
pli-tv-pvr19:12.4: are spoken of by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:13.1: “How many serious (offences against) Discipline are spoken of?
pli-tv-pvr19:13.3: How many flavours of grain at a wrong time?
pli-tv-pvr19:13.4: How many agreements for a motion followed by a resolution made three times?”
pli-tv-pvr19:14.1: “Two serious (offences against) Discipline are spoken of
pli-tv-pvr19:14.3: One flavour of grain at a wrong time,
pli-tv-pvr19:14.4: one agreement for a motion followed by a resolution made three times.
pli-tv-pvr19:15.4: How many two finger-breadths are laid down?”
pli-tv-pvr19:16.4: two finger-breadths twice are laid down.”
pli-tv-pvr19:17.2: By how many is an Order split?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.3: How many here are first offenders?
pli-tv-pvr19:17.4: How many carryings out of a motion?”
pli-tv-pvr19:18.2: by two is an Order split,
pli-tv-pvr19:18.3: Two here are the first offenders,
pli-tv-pvr19:18.4: two carryings out of a motion.”
pli-tv-pvr19:19.1: “How many offences in onslaught on creatures?
pli-tv-pvr19:19.4: Or how many because of a go-between?”
pli-tv-pvr19:21.1: “How many individuals should not be ordained?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.2: How many things included in formal acts?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.3: How many are called ones who are expelled?
pli-tv-pvr19:21.4: For how many is a one fold formula?”
pli-tv-pvr19:22.2: three things included in formal acts,
pli-tv-pvr19:22.3: Three are called ones who are expelled,
pli-tv-pvr19:22.4: for three is a one fold formula.”
pli-tv-pvr19:23.1: “How many offences in taking what has not been given?
pli-tv-pvr19:23.3: How many offences for cutting off?
pli-tv-pvr19:23.4: How many because of throwing down?”
pli-tv-pvr19:24.1: “Three offences in taking what has not been given,
pli-tv-pvr19:25.2: for an exhorter in an incomplete (Order of) nuns,
pli-tv-pvr19:25.3: How many here are spoken of as nonads?
pli-tv-pvr19:25.4: And of how many in regard to robe-material?”
pli-tv-pvr19:26.1: “Offences of wrong-doing with Expiation are done
pli-tv-pvr19:26.2: by an exhorter in an incomplete (Order of) nuns,
pli-tv-pvr19:26.3: Four here are spoken of as nonads,
pli-tv-pvr19:26.4: and of two in regard to robe-material.”
pli-tv-pvr19:27.4: when they partake of raw grain?”
pli-tv-pvr19:28.4: when they partake of raw grain.”
pli-tv-pvr19:29.1: “How many offences for one who is walking?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.2: And how many for one who is standing?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.3: How many offences for one who is sitting?
pli-tv-pvr19:29.4: And how many for one who is lying down?”
pli-tv-pvr19:30.1: “Four offences for one who is walking,
pli-tv-pvr19:30.2: and as many too for one who is standing,
pli-tv-pvr19:30.3: Four offences for one who is sitting,
pli-tv-pvr19:30.4: and as many too for one who is lying down.”
pli-tv-pvr19:31.3: could one simultaneously fall into together?”
pli-tv-pvr19:32.3: that one could simultaneously fall into together.”
pli-tv-pvr19:33.3: could one simultaneously fall into together?”
pli-tv-pvr19:34.3: that one could simultaneously fall into together.”

pli-tv-pvr19:36.3: That should be confessed by one formula
pli-tv-pvr19:36.4: are spoken of by the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:37.3: Should be confessed by how many formulae
pli-tv-pvr19:37.4: are spoken of by the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:38.3: That should be confessed by one formula
pli-tv-pvr19:38.4: are spoken of by the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:39.3: Should be confessed after one has announced something,
pli-tv-pvr19:39.4: are spoken of by the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:40.3: Should be confessed after one has announced the matter,
pli-tv-pvr19:40.4: are spoken of by the Kinsman of the Sun.”
pli-tv-pvr19:41.3: Should be confessed after one has announced something
pli-tv-pvr19:41.4: are spoken of by the Kinsman of the Sun?”
pli-tv-pvr19:42.3: Should be confessed after one has announced the matter

pli-tv-pvr19:43.1: “How many offences up to the third time?
pli-tv-pvr19:43.3: How many for one who is eating?
pli-tv-pvr19:44.1: “Three offences up to the third time,
pli-tv-pvr19:44.3: Three offences for one who is eating,
pli-tv-pvr19:45.3: And for how many are offences?
pli-tv-pvr19:45.4: For how many by a legal question?”
pli-tv-pvr19:46.3: And there is an offence for five,
pli-tv-pvr19:46.4: and for five by a legal question.”
pli-tv-pvr19:47.1: “For how many is there an investigation?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.2: And for how many by a settlement?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.3: And for how many simply no offence?
pli-tv-pvr19:47.4: For how many reasons does one shine?”
pli-tv-pvr19:48.2: and for five by a settlement,
pli-tv-pvr19:48.4: for three reasons does one shine.”
pli-tv-pvr19:49.3: How many offences for looking at with longing?
pli-tv-pvr19:50.3: One offence for looking at with longing,
pli-tv-pvr19:51.2: should one confess out of faith in others?
pli-tv-pvr19:51.3: How many are spoken of as being suspended?
pli-tv-pvr19:52.2: should one confess out of faith in others,
pli-tv-pvr19:52.3: Three are spoken of as being suspended,
pli-tv-pvr19:53.1: “On how many occasions is there lying speech?
pli-tv-pvr19:53.3: How many are to be Confessed?
pli-tv-pvr19:53.4: And of how many were there confessions?”
pli-tv-pvr19:54.1: “On five occasions is there lying speech,
pli-tv-pvr19:54.4: and of four were there confessions.”
pli-tv-pvr19:55.3: How many are the factors for (going on) a message?
pli-tv-pvr19:55.4: How many the customs of other sects?”
pli-tv-pvr19:56.3: Eight factors for (going on) a message,
pli-tv-pvr19:57.2: For how many should there be rising from?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.3: To how many should a seat be given?
pli-tv-pvr19:57.4: Of how many is an exhorter of nuns?”
pli-tv-pvr19:58.2: for eight should there be rising from,
pli-tv-pvr19:58.3: To eight should a seat be given,
pli-tv-pvr19:58.4: of eight is an exhorter of nuns.”
pli-tv-pvr19:59.1: “Of how many is there ‘could be destroyed’?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.2: Of how many a grave offence?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.3: And of how many simply no offence?
pli-tv-pvr19:59.4: Are they one subject for all?”
pli-tv-pvr19:60.3: And of four simply no offence,
pli-tv-pvr19:60.4: they are one subject for all.”
pli-tv-pvr19:61.2: By how many is an Order split?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.3: How many here are offences at once?
pli-tv-pvr19:61.4: How many carryings out by a motion?”
pli-tv-pvr19:62.2: an Order is split by nine,
pli-tv-pvr19:62.3: Nine here are offences at once,
pli-tv-pvr19:62.4: nine carryings out by a motion.”

pli-tv-pvr19:63.4: How many for wearing the three robes?”
pli-tv-pvr19:64.2: nor (receive) joined palms or proper homage,
pli-tv-pvr19:64.3: For ten is there an offence of wrong-doing,

pli-tv-pvr19:65.2: should a robe be given here?
pli-tv-pvr19:65.3: For how many should purity be declared?
pli-tv-pvr19:65.4: and for how many likewise not declared?”

pli-tv-pvr19:66.2: should a robe be given here,
pli-tv-pvr19:66.4: be declared, for sixteen not declared.”
pli-tv-pvr19:67.4: could he who is under probation be freed?”
pli-tv-pvr19:68.4: he who is under probation could be freed.”

pli-tv-pvr19:70.4: all were made not legally valid.”

pli-tv-pvr19:74.2: by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun,

pli-tv-pvr19:74.5: Five were spoken of as not legally valid
pli-tv-pvr19:74.6: by the Buddha, the Kinsman of the Sun.”
